ygData.subject: Re: Maxima/Empath

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@a...>" 
<EmprzAnastazia@a...> wrote:

> She glanced down. The idea of the Ark destroyed didn't bother her 
> much. It was the fact that Megatron would be in danger that did 
alarm 
> her greatly. "I have to try, Empath." Pausing a moment. "I won't 
risk 
> Megatron's termination. Hence why I think that I need to go... to 
> protect it. If they were as intelligent as they say they are, then 
> they already know the location. All they have to do is go there & 
> destroy it." then she thought. "Then again, if they did, there 
would 
> be none of us now. Well, except for you & I since we were not 
aboard 
> the Ark." She felt she had to protect her comrades in stasis on the 
> Ark.  
> 
> Then she looked up. "As I see it, this transorganic form is weaker 
> than my old form. For one... I can't fly." she smirked. She 
wondered 
> if that was a touchy spot for the old Seeker considering if she was 
> anything like the other Seekers, flight was the ultimate in freedom 
& 
> conquest.

"It's just a matter of getting a vehicle form built in, like I did," 
Empath points out.  "Granted, we can't achieve supersonic speeds 
anymore, but it's worth it.  Any tech-bot could do you that favor - 
knowing our resident genius, Wheeljack-X, he'd be happy to help."  

A whispering voice causes her ears to prick up, despite knowing that 
there was nobody to make the sound - it's not coming through the air, 
but rather in her mind.  Empath blinks.  "Did you hear something?"
